title: Social Studies Simulation Development Workshop Using Graphic-Based Learning Design Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social studies knowledge and experience using digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Program to enhance learning design and assessment capabilities using graphic tools in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can express the conceptual structure of social studies simulation activities in the form of a concept map using a graphic learning design tool.
Learners can visually orchestrate the flow of designed learning activities and convert them into sequences implementable in a VR environment.
Learners can generate summative assessment items by linking learning scenarios created via design tools to a smartphone-based evaluation system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
